name: Robinson Crusoé
description:
This game isn't finished yet, so not all features are added yet too. Thus, the game has no story and has no goal / end. All these features will be added thereafter. Stay tuned for more updates. Description :

This game is a 3d survival game where you can play as Robinson Crusoé. You can build, destroy, chop down some trees, pickup some items and explore the ship. This game is in pre-alpha, donate will allows me to open a Steam page for this game. I've made this game for fun and to challenging myself and all of that with free stuff. Please don't hesitate to send me your reviews (positive or negative) via Discord or via the comments section, it will really help me to improve the game.

What can I do ?
  • Change the settings as you want
  • Play and experiment the alpha version of the game
  • Join the official Discord server and share your experiences
Recommended hardware :
  • Intel core i5 3,2 GHz
  • Nvidia GTX 550M or equivalent
  • 4 GB of ram
  • Less than 1Gb of free disk space
  • Windows x64 (should work on Windows 7, 8 and work on Windows 10)
Release date is defined to Saturday, 22th February.
